entry.title: Meta
entry.quote: That’s also why I considered titling this article “House of Zuck”; that, more than ever, is what Meta née Facebook is. Today’s Facebook Connect keynote is entirely about a future that doesn’t yet exist; believing that it will happen rests on the degree to which you believe that Zuckerberg the founder can accomplish more than any mere manager.

entry.title: Why is Delta so infectious? New lab tool spotlights little noticed mutation that speeds viral spread
entry.quote: “Viruslike particles” open the way to safely study nucleocapsid and other viral proteins

entry.title: ‘The Great Resignation’ Misses the Point
entry.quote: The phrase has come to describe record levels of job turnover. But it overlooks the bigger story: a radical rethinking of our relationship to work.

entry.title: Combating Disinformation With Humility.
entry.quote: Humility empowers an individual by providing him the willingness to cultivate critical thinking i.e. a method to discover whether an idea is wrong.

entry.title: Introducing Isomorphic Labs
entry.quote: Reimagining the entire drug discovery process with an AI-first approach
